arts.ttl: Semenyo shines as Bournemouth beat Brighton
arts.sum: Antoine Semenyo chips in with a goal and an assist in Bournemouth's 2-1 win against Brighton & Hove Albion at the Vitality Stadium.

arts.ttl: Hurzeler fumes at controversial decision as Brighton fall to Bournemouth
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler was left fuming after Bournemouth beat Brighton with the help of a controversial goal in the Premier League on Saturday. Alex Scott gave the Cherries an early lead after firing in a stunning striker from just outside the area in the 18th minute at home. The visitors hit back shortly after the break […] The post Hurzeler fumes at controversial decision as Brighton fall to Bournemouth first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth’s Antoine Semenyo spot-on to see off Brighton revival
arts.sum: Antoine Semenyo scored one goal and set up the other as Bournemouth beat Brighton 2-1. Alex Scott netted his first league goal since December 2023, with Kaoru Mitoma equalising for the visitors. The Cherries handed a surprise top-flight debut to Veljko Milosavljevic, their 18-year-old transfer deadline day signing, with the centre-back Bafodé Diakité injured. At the other end of the age spectrum, the 39-year-old James Milner replaced Carlos Baleba in Brighton’s starting lineup. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Controversial Semenyo penalty hands dominant B'mouth win over Brighton
arts.sum: A controversial second-half penalty from Antoine Semenyo was enough to hand Bournemouth a 2-1 victory against Brighton.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Brighton: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4, 2025
arts.sum: The Cherries have got off to another positive start this season, currently sitting in 7th with six points, having most recently defeated Thomas Frank's Tottenham Hotspur . Meanwhile, Adam Webster is a long-term absence for the Seagulls, also recovering from a knee injury.

arts.ttl: Brighton XI vs Bournemouth – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brighton travel to the south coast for their clash with Bournemouth full of confidence after a superb comeback victory against Manchester City. That result provided the perfect springboard as they head into the rest of the season. However, the Seagulls are still searching for their first away win of the campaign. arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Brighton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bournemouth return to the Vitality Stadium with renewed purpose after an impressive start to the season. The Cherries bounced back from an opening-day defeat with two consecutive victories, including a notable win away at Tottenham.
